mosimage.caption: Sunny Leone launched the ninth season of MTV Splitsvilla.

story.storykicker: MTV Splitsvilla 9 to have new set of rules, men will have to stand up & fight for women.
story.storybody:
Bollywood siren Sunny Leone launched the ninth season of the popular reality television show MTV Splitsvilla along with co-host Rannvijay Singh at an event in Mumbai on Tuesday.

The channel has decided to alter the rules of the game slightly this year, to make it more exciting. This time, the show is based on the theme 'Where Women Rule', and it gives more power to the female contestants than their male counterparts.

Also read: Splitsvilla 9 to start on June 11; Rannvijay, Sunny launch the fresh season

Fifteen boys, or warriors, will be competing to woo female contestants who are the princesses on the show. In the end, one boy and one girl will be crowned winners.

{mosimage}

Both Sunny and Rannvijay expressed joy on returning as hosts and mentors of the dating reality show, which is based on the American dating game show, Flavor Of Love.

Also read: The trailer for Splitsvilla 9 is here, and this time the ladies are in charge

"I am thrilled to be back on Splitsvilla, more so because this time the ultimate power lies in the hands of women. Women rule this season, and you will see the shift in power as six gorgeous princesses dictate who stays in the show and who does not," said former adult moovie star, Sunny.

She feels the concept of women on top would make the world a better place. "Everyone says it's a man's world, but I assure you the world will look better with women at the helm. You will see this on Splitsvillathis season," said Sunny, who turned up in a black flared gown for the do.

Rannvijay Singh flaunted his new look--a flourishing moutache and thick beard. The duo posed for shutterbugs with MTV girls Saloni Chopra, Barkha Singh, Ayesha Adlakha and Gaelyn Mendonca. Rannvijay thinks the new format of the game will make it more exciting.

"There is no king this time. The guys have to work harder," he said. MTV Splitsvilla season 9 will go on air from season 9.
